## Types of Data
Data will be contaminant concentrations and descriptior variables.
Data will be saved in .csv files.


## Data and Metadata Standards
Metadata will be saved in a corresponding .txt file (eg EUSO2.csv has a companion EUSO2.txt metadata file.) This file will describe the source and variables in the .csv data.
